title: Satellites
description: Satellites informs the reader in detail about various artificial satellites and provides some of the history of these satellites. The book also describes how we use satellites in our lives today and the ways satellites may be used in our future. Readers learn even more as they view the exceptional photographs.
highFrequencyWords: artificial satellites, astronomical satellites, bus, communication satellites, environmental satellites, GPS, gravity, low-Earth Orbit, meteorologists, military satellite, navigational satellites, orbits, payload, Polar Orbit, weather satellites
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Dictionary Skills                : Use a dictionary to look up content words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
